name: Reposition
flavour: Think, plan, make sure you're in the right place.
effect: Move into an Adjacent Section

name: Recover
effect: Regain 1 Stamina and Cleanse Fatigued

name: Use Antivenom
effect: This action can only be taken after using the Cleanse Self action. Cleanse Poisoned

name: Valiant Roar
effect: All characters currently interdicted by you have +1 difficulty on their next check to reposition.

name: Stand Fast
effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies within the same section can only make attacks against you. Additionally when you use this ability you restore X Stamina

name: Battle Hymn
effect: Begin singing a battle hymn. When you take this action, choose a hymn option you have unlocked to use. Using the same hymn increases its effect. The effects of the hymn last until your turn ends and you do not take this action.

name: Rallying Cry
effect: All allies with the fatigued effect in your section cleanse fatigued and restore 1 stamina.

name: Purifying Aria
effect: All allies restore 2 stamina and may take the Cleanse Self acti

name: Shattering Charge
effect: Instantly trigger the forward movement of the Clash.

name: Finishing Touch
effect: Instantly deal 5 wounds to a Fatigued character

name: Craft Equipment
effect: Choose any piece of equipment from the Excursion Equipment List. You instantly add this piece of equipment to your inventory. This piece of equipment always has 0 weight.

name: Prepare Shot
effect: Choose an enemy in range of one of your ranged weapons. Your next ranged attack against this enemy has +1 accuracy.

name: Heart Seeking Shot
effect: The next ranged attack that hits an enemy deals an additonal one wound, whether the enemy is Fatigued or not.

name: Step of the Wyld
effect: Until the end of your turn, you ignore all terrain tags, excluding Inaccessible.
Add any terrain tag to any section until the end of your next turn, excluding Inaccessible.

name: Nature's Wrath
effect: Choose a non-disengaged section. All enemy characters in that section take two damage and are Snared until the end of your next turn. You may reapply this effect for 2AP targeting the same section as long as you do not end your turn without taking this action.

name: Recast Nature's Wrath
effect: All enemies in the section marked by Nature's Wrath take 2 damage and are Snared until the end of their next turn.

name: Roads Less Traveled
effect: Choose a Non-Disengaged Section, you instantly appear there and regain 4 AP.

name: Hex
effect: Make a magic attack against an enemy within medium range. On a hit, the target gains the Hexed condition and is inflicted with a debuff from the Hexes list while they have this condition. The target may only cleanse this condition with the Remove Hex action. You may only have one Hex active at a time, and if you apply another, the original target cleanses the Hexed condition.

name: Overwhelming Curse
effect: Make a magic attack against an enemy within medium range. On a hit, the target gains the Hexed condition and is inflicted with a debuff from the Hexes list while they have this condition. The target may only cleanse this condition with the Remove Hex action. You may only have one Hex active at a time, and if you apply another, the original target cleanses the Hexed condition.

name: Field Distillation
effect: Add an Alchemical Concoction to your inventory. If you already have a Paralyzing Poison, you may not add another to your inventory. This action may be taken outside of combat.

name: Add Secret Ingredient
effect: You may use this action when you take an action with the Alchemical Concoction tag. Empower the action you just took.

name: Bountiful Harvest
effect: Choose an ally, they restore 1 Stamina

name: With Death Comes Life
effect: Grant an ally X AP, where X is the current number of With Death Comes Life Stacks.

name: Sow Ground
effect: Choose one of your ranged sections. Any allied character who begins their turn in this section restores 1 Stamina. Only one section may have Sow Ground on it at a time.

name: Guardian Angel
effect: Remove a combined total of 4 wounds from all allies.

name: Foresight
effect: Choose an allied character or yourself and roll a d20. The next time that character rolls a d20, take the roll that was just made instead of rolling the dice again.

name: Steel Forecast
effect: Choose an enemy character. All attacks they make have +1 difficulty until the start of their next turn.

name: Trick Visions
effect: Choose an allied character. The next attack made against this character has a 50% chance to miss. This is decided before the attack roll is made.

name: Weave Fate
effect:
Reaction. 
 Trigger: A character rolls a D20. 
 Effect: You may replace the result of the roll with a result of your choosing.

name: Abduction
effect: This action can only be taken while in the clash. Choose an enemy character in the NPC Medium Range section. They are immediately moved into the Clash.

name: Storm Of Steel
effect: Until the end of your turn, the AP cost of the Weapon Attack action and the Switch Equipment action is reduced by 1 AP.
